resources.string: A photo of the Acknowledgement is required
Sorry, your age is not qualified for this insurance

string-array.name: service_interests
string-array.item: Health articles I can read myself
Reminders to my phone for healthier lifestyle (e.g. reminder to get a check up, or screening)
Health Information through Facebook or WhatsApp
Local health events, run in my community
Access to doctors via phone/video call
Personal health services in my home (e.g. blood pressure checks at home)
Connecting to other patients with the same condition as me to learn/share
Access to health insurance to cover my bills
Access to life insurance, in case of accidents and to protect my family if I pass away
Access to nutrition or wellness products (e.g. vitamins)
Access to consumer non-prescription medication (e.g. paracetamol)
Access to consumer health products (e.g. toothpaste)
None of the above (cannot select if other option selected)
I don’t want to say (cannot select if other option selected)

string-array.name: existing_insurance_options
string-array.item: I have personal life or healthcare insurance plan
I have other insurance (e.g. crop, motor insurance)
I am part of a group or family plan (e.g. from my employer)
I do not have insurance but am interested in this
I am not interested in insurance

string-array.name: future_insurance_options
string-array.item: Medical reimbursement for primary care (e.g. testing, doctors appointments)

string-array.name: health_conditions
string-array.item: None of the above (cannot select if other option selected)
I don’t want to say (cannot select if other option selected)

string-array.name: follow_up_reason
string-array.item: Did not have a prescription/valid prescription

Follow up date cannot be empty
Invalid input: special characters not allowed as first input

string-array.name: carousel_titles
string-array.item: What does a Marketplace Area Manager do?
Why should you become a Marketplace Area Manager?
reach52 marketplace has everything you need for your health in one place
Ready to sign up… here’s how:

resources.string:
In order for us to process your order and deliver medicines and any other services to you, we must capture your consent. Please read the below and confirm your consent for us to process this order on your behalf. The below is designed to make the process of receiving your medicines easier, transparent and legal. Once we have received this Consent Form, we will be able to deliver our services to you.

I am made fully aware, and likewise amenable, that this pilot shall last for three (3) months only.

I give permission for my prescription or any other order form to be stored and processed, in line with providing me with the described order fulfilment service.

I give permission to analyse the information provided therein, to drive service improvement.

I give permission for any repeat or part-shipped orders, to be stored and processed.

I accept responsibility for being available at the suggested or agreed time of the delivery to my home, or to personally collect from a collection point (which collection point REACH52 will advise me when the collection or delivery is due).

In the event that I am not able to personally receive my medication, I give permission for my medicine to be delivered to an approved family member or someone who lives in my household.

At my request, I give consent for REACH52 or any of its authorized representative to collect my prescription from the local health provider, if required and the same becomes available and necessary.

At my request, I give consent to collect my dispensed medication from a suitable stocking point on a recurrent basis.

I give consent to REACH52 to deliver the dispensed medicines to my home or I agree to collect from an agreed location upon request.

I give permission for my personal data, as provided below, to be stored digitally and processed and likewise shared with other relevant parties that are necessary to process and fulfil this and any future order of mine. The authorization hereby given to REACH52 shall be valid for a period of 10 years from the date of my signature unless expressly revoked by me through proper written notice to REACH52.

I understand that my data will be processed by REACH52 only, and in accordance with applicable local regulations, laws and guidelines.

       

REACH52 makes all transactions transparent to the patient at the time of ordering to avoid any hidden cost and so:

I agree to pay the price of the order as provided at the time of ordering. The ordered price shall already include the price of goods, taxes and any additional services, for example: medicines delivery, etc.

I agree to pay any agreed recurring fees as agreed at the time of ordering.

       

In providing targeted, low cost products and services, REACH52 has to ensure that the products and services are received by their intended, qualifying recipients, therefore:

I give my permission for my data to be processed as a means of ensuring that the qualification criteria for the goods and services are met.

I understand that any qualifying criteria against which my profile may be assessed, are available to me upon request.

I confirm that this order is for myself and will not be shared, sold or distributed to any other persons or organisations. If I do not comply with this, I understand this is a breach of contract and amounts to fraud, and this contracted service and/or arrangement shall be terminated and referred to law enforcement authorities.

I agree to use the products and services in line with the guidance issued in order to ensure that the beneficial effects are maximised.

I confirm that I all the information I have herein provided are true and correct.

       

REACH52 is only interested in providing services to persons who wish and agree to participate and so:

I reserve the right to terminate or amend this agreement at any time, but this will result in my order not being processed or delivered.

I agree that I will be liable for the payment for any goods or services being fulfilled, delivered or outstanding at the time of cancellation or change.

In the event that there is an adverse event that may be related to products I have purchased thru REACH52, I give REACH52 the consent to further collect details about

said adverse event, forward the same details to drug manufacturers or health authorities, and likewise give consent for REACH52’s partners or any health authorities to contact me to get additional information in the interest of patient safety as required and necessary.

string-array.name: carousel_bodies
string-array.item:
Deliver health services for your community.

Excellent rewards and opportunities for you!

reach52 delivers affordable healthcare to over 400 communities.

reach52 marketplace is an online catalogue, with everything you need for your health in one place.

You visit people in your community – residents neighbours, friends and family.

Order products on reach52 marketplace. Deliver products into the community.

It’s as simple as that!

• Get paid for every order you make
  • The more orders you make, the more you get paid
  • Be your own boss – you choose when to work
  • Fast track your career with world class training
  • Support your community through affordable healthcare

• Vitamins, Medicines, Insurance and a wide range of Family Health products
  • Affordable prices, delivered direct to communities
  • No travel, no hassle, just better health

• Fill in your details in the form
  • Submit and await validation
  • Receive instructions to complete training
  • Complete training, then you’re ready to go!

resources.string:
What are the minimum requirements to become a Marketplace Area Manager?​

  • You must be at least 18 years old​.

How much does a Marketplace Area Manager typically earn?

  • You get a commission for every order you make through reach52 marketplace​.
  • The more orders you make, the more commission you make.
​

I’m ready to sign up, what do I do next?​

  • Just submit your details in the form here along with photo ID​.
  • We’ll then confirm your sign up as Marketplace Area Manager​.
  • You’ll then receive training from us to get you started​.

What does a Marketplace Area Manager do?

  • Meets with residents in an assigned area to promote reach52 marketplace.
  • Supports residents in selecting and ordering the products and services they need from the catalogue.
  • Receives payment for orders from residents on behalf of reach52’s partners.
  • Coordinates with their Territory Manager for orders made, and remittance of payments based on agreed upon timeframes on a weekly basis.
  • Submit the sales sheet on a weekly basis.
  • Receives or picks up orders from their Territory Manager and deliver orders to the residents.
  • Coordinates scheduled delivery dates to minimize failed deliveries.
  • Supports reach52 and its partners to put marketing materials in key areas for residents.
Efficiently onboard residents and access their records or appointments with ease.
Purchase medicine and track resident orders in one app.
Showcase available insurance plans and place orders for your residents.
Create and edit resident records, place orders even while offline.
SIGN UP AS A NORMAL USER
SIGN UP AS A COMMUNITY MANAGER
